titles.title: To provide that the amount authorized to be appropriated for national defense functions of the Government for fiscal year 1999 may not exceed the amount authorized to be appropriated for national defense functions for fiscal year 1998.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on National Security.

bill.summary: 4/1/1998--Introduced. Prohibits the amount authorized to be appropriated for national defense functions for FY 1999 from exceeding the amount so authorized for FY 1998 ($268,301,837,000).
